metadata.name: The Regen Atlas | Celo ReFi
metadata.description: The Regen Atlas is a blockchain-enabled platform designed to facilitate displaying, funding, and incubating of natural capital projects through a user-friendly, interactive map interface. This proposal seeks to leverage Celo's distinct focus on tokenized natural capital, by offering a platform where users can directly browse, purchase, and request funding for a variety of green crypto-assets, thereby broadening Celo's appeal and utility for environmental projects and investors interested in Regenerative Finance (ReFi).
